full_threads.body:
Hi Rena and Joe,

Please see attached the updated Spot UV file.

Rena, please confirm that this is what you were after? I have also applied the gloss to the pattern on the bottom of the cover page to balance the design out. I hope this is ok?

Thanks and speak soon,



HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

Hi Rena,

Apologies for the miss communication. To be clear it's only the swatches of the gloss samples that need the treatment and the logo and hero image on the front page?

Everything else is just a normal print?

Thanks, Heath

Hi Rena



I've set this up to run on Monday morning for your proof.



I assume I have to put this on hold for the moment?



Kind Regards,



Joe Ryall
New Business Development



T 1300 021 021 joe@cbsprinting.com.au T 0455 237 788 http://promo.cbsprinting.com.au/ 5 Waler CrescentF 02 4647 5486 http://www.cbsprinting.com.au/ Smeaton Grange NSW 2567

Heath,

As per my fist email, we only wanted the "gloss samples and the image on the front page and our logo in a gloss." Not all the colours! Could you please change this asap and resend?





Regards,

Rena How

Sales Consultant

1300 387 228 | rena.bulloch@duracube.com.au | http://www.duracube.com.au/

Hi Heath



The artwork file you sent this morning with the Spot Gloss Area has no image under the pink of the spot area. Can you please re-supply ASAP?



Thanks!




Kind Regards,



Joe Ryall
New Business Development



T 1300 021 021 joe@cbsprinting.com.au T 0455 237 788 http://promo.cbsprinting.com.au/ 5 Waler CrescentF 02 4647 5486 http://www.cbsprinting.com.au/ Smeaton Grange NSW 2567

Hi Joe,

The same file should be used for both. The CMYK colours can be used for the main artwork and then the Spot Colour for the Spot Gloss. This way it will line up perfectly.

When I added the Spot Colour this morning, I made some slight adjustments so the original file will be out of alignment.

I hope that clarifies? Thanks,

HEATH MAGUIRE


CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

Hi Heath



The spot gloss area you provided earlier has all the crop marks associated with the 6pp layout but the CMYK files we downloaded a few days ago do not. Can you possibly amend the CMYK files to the same dims as the Spot Gloss?



Thanks!




Kind Regards,



Joe Ryall
New Business Development

Regards,

Rena Bulloch

Sales Consultant

Tel: 1300 387 228
Email: sales@duracube.com.au

Hi Rena, 

Apologies on my delay in getting back to you. 

We can do this, however the printer will have (generally) have a specific format they prefer to receive this in. Have they sent any info to you?

Hello Heath,

We are getting the colour chart printed and like last time, we want to get the gloss samples and the image on the front page and our logo in a gloss. Would you be able to provide the file for this?

If we could get this through tomorrow that would be great.

Thanks

Rena How
Marketing
